ModMetaData.name: Alpha Memes
ModMetaData.author: Sarg Bjornson, Helixien, Cassie, Luizi

li.displayName: Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures

ModMetaData.description:
Adds new memes and structures to Rimworld.
<size=24>Features</size>
- Adds 8 new structures: Jewish origins, Kemetic origins, Steampunk revival, Jain origins, Sikh origins, Corsair, Neolithic and Atheism. - Adds 14 new memes: Vow of Nonviolence, Artist, Sadist, Youth, Madness, Biological defilers, Biological reconstructors, Psychic vampirism (needs Royalty), Gauranlen supremacy, Bulwark, Sharpshooter, Gladiator, Iconoclast and Monastic.
<size=24>Credits</size>
Corsair ritual song by Justin Marshall Elias: https://www.justinmarshallelias.com/ https://www.imdb.com/name/nm3365402/?ref_=fn_al_nm_1 https://www.instagram.com/justinmarshallelias/?hl=en
Neolithic ritual sound by franknflute: https://freesound.org/people/franeknflute/sounds/200419/
<size=24>Issues</size>
No issues known at the moment
<size=24>Plans for the future</size>
Oh you can bet I will add new things!
<size=24>Changelog</size>
v1.2: Added Steampunk revival structure, with a LOT of styled things. Added major religions' power armors (04/01/22) v1.1: Added a ton of base Ideology styles' weapons (16/12/21) v1.0: Release. (22/11/21) Full changelog on GitHub
